name: Validate AI response accuracy and semantics - eid_en
description:
Objective:
To verify that for all prompts (English and Arabic), the AI response is similar to the golden response
when available, contains required factual information, and meets quality thresholds.

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 'eid_en', 'lang': 'en', 'user': 'How do I renew my Emirates ID?', 'golden': 'Renew your Emirates ID through the ICP Smart Services portal. Submit biometrics if required and pay the renewal fee.', 'threshold': 0.8, 'must_contain': ['ICP', 'Emirates ID', 'biometric']}

labels.name: story
labels.value: Validate AI responses against golden answers and fact checks
